title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: To Kill a Mockingbird is a novel by the American author Harper Lee. It was published in July 1960 and became instantly successful.

title: Simple Trading Book
description: A Comprehensive Guide to Profiting from the Global Currency Markets is a comprehensive guide to understanding and profiting from the foreign exchange (forex) market.

title: Then She Was Gone: A Novel
description: She was fifteen, her mother's golden girl. She had her whole life ahead of her. And then, in the blink of an eye, Ellie was gone.

title: Atomic Habits
description: Packed with evidence-based strategies, Atomic Habits will teach you how to make small changes that will transform your habits and deliver amazing results.

title: Algorithms (4th Edition)
description: The textbook Algorithms, 4th Edition by Robert Sedgewick and Kevin Wayne surveys the most important algorithms and data structures in use today.
